alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 6:45AM EDT until March 27 at 8:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Eatonton. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand into the woodlands and fields along the river of the Oconee National Forest upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Monticello Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 18.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 21.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
